creator: Helen Waddell
description:
LibriVox recording of Lyrics from the Chinese by Helen Waddell.

Read in English by MaryAnn Spiegel.

Thirty-six short Chinese poems from the 12th to the 7th Century B.C. are translated into English by Irish Poet Helen Waddell. Summary by MaryAnn.

For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.
subject: librivox; audiobooks;poetry; china; chinese poetry
title: Lyrics from the Chinese
